title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: Earl's Court Exhibition Centre
directions: tube: Earl's Court or West Brompton
content: Hosts frequent conventions, exhibitions, concerts and events. Located on the site used for Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show in the 19th century. It has two halls, Earl's Court One and Earl's Court Two. See it while you can; the site has controversially been scheduled to be demolished and redeveloped. Times and prices vary.
